text: inerisuni mak’inati be’anite layi yelebihimi፡፡ gini alahi yemishawini sewi yak’enali፡፡ kegenizebimi yemitilegisuti (minidawi) lenefisochachihu newi፡፡ ye’alahinimi fiti (widetawini) lemefelegi iniji atilegisumi፡፡ kegenizebimi yemitilegisuti hulu (minidawi) wedenanite yimolali፡፡ inanitemi atibedelumi፡፡
